On Escalation Ticket # 00429796 the new comment has been added: Marius-Viorel Iacob:

@WaitingOnEngineer
Hello,
In the install package, in the options.sh there are 2 lines that need to be un-commented (remove the # at the start of the line) and set the variable value to 1.
Like so:

--- CODE ---EPPCLIENT_DISABLECAP=1

export EPPCLIENT_DISABLECAP
--- CODE ---

[DevOps CommentId:11407134]
